title: Analysis: Russia's Ukraine attack forces Beijing into diplomatic dance
description: Russia's attack on Ukraine, which China refuses to condemn or even call an invasion, has sent Beijing into a diplomatic scramble to limit blowback while standing by a partner with which it has grown increasingly close in opposition to the West.
content: BEIJING, Feb 26 (Reuters) - Russia's attack on Ukraine, which China refuses to condemn or even call an invasion, has sent Beijing into a diplomatic scramble to limit blowback while standing by a partâ€¦ [+4501 chars]
